solution_line_template: At the highest setting, it vibrates {lowest_setting_vps}*{percent_faster}=<<{lowest_setting_vps}*{percent_faster}={vps_increase}>>{vps_increase} vibrations per second faster than the lowest setting
So it vibrates at {lowest_setting_vps}+{vps_increase}=<<{lowest_setting_vps}+{vps_increase}={highest_setting_vps}>>{highest_setting_vps} vibrations per second
Matt uses it for {minutes_used} minutes so that is {minutes_used}*{seconds_per_minute}=<<{minutes_used}*{seconds_per_minute}={total_seconds}>>{total_seconds} seconds
